- **Current position: ** I am an Assistant Professor (Ricercatore SECS-S/01, Legge 240/10 tipo A) at the [Department of Mathematics](https://www.mate.polimi.it/?lg=en) of [Politecnico di Milano](https://www.polimi.it/en). I am a member of the [MOX](https://mox.polimi.it/) laboratory of mathematical modelling and scientific computing. I am currently working on a project named GRINS: Growing Resilient, INclusive and Sustainable which is part of the Next Generation EU program (National Recovery and Resilience Plan).
- **Research interests: ** I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models for data on linear networks (such as car crashes or ambulance interventions). Get the complete curriculum vitae from [here](https://github.com/agila5/cv/raw/master/gilardi_cv.pdf).
